'''Yuan Hong''' is an [[NPC]] in [[Mingyun Village]], [[Liyue]]. He can be seen before and during the [[World Quest]] ''[[The Tree who Stands Alone]].'' When the quest is over, he will disappear from the overworld.

He is the father of three deceased sons: [[Yuan Cheng]], [[Yuan Qing]] and [[Yuan Liang]].

===Appearance===
Yuan Hong is an elderly bald man with a slim build. He appears as a ghost.
During the World Quest [[The Tree who Stands Alone]] he can be seen wearing some old clothes.
